google_play_reviews.content: Hey! This app is almost perfect, but I suspect that the issue is an android issue and not a Cool Mic problem. After connecting to external icecast server from the app and locking the screen, the audio seems to go to sleep a minute or so after the phone locks. Pixel 6, Android 12 with a Behringer UCA 202 connected with a USB-C to USB F adapter. I've gone into app permissions and given it unrestricted battery and unlimited network permissions. Problem persists. 5 stars if you can help resolve! :)
Audio Streaming goes easy! Special appreciation to the developers.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you! I'm happy you are finding it useful.

google_play_reviews.content: the app works! i want to ask you which are the settings for the least amount of latency. bandwidth irrelevant. i tried a lot but the results differ. thanks!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review Stefan! Please contact us via our website so we can best answer your question.
Thank you very much, we're happy you are enjoying it!

google_play_reviews.content: how do you connect this to mixxx broadcast that has an icecast server. tried everything have not found anything else so someone can listen to my radio station.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your question, Cool Mic interfaces with Icecast v2 servers, it does not connect to Mixxx directly in that way. Please reconsider your rating as it would help us greatly. Thank you for your review and if you have any further questions please contact us at team@coolmic.net - thank you!

google_play_reviews.content: I love it... Great App really helps
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We're glad you're enjoying it, thank you for your rating!

google_play_reviews.content: love it! it just works. solid. humble.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your feedback! We're going to be releasing a new beta with new features very soon, so look for that!

google_play_reviews.content: I now have an Icecast server, and after trying a bunch of apps, I'm glad to have stumbled upon Cool Mic! Great design, app is very straight forward and easy to use. One thing that would be awesome would be the ability to stream music to your Icecast server as well as your voice. P.S. I am totally blind, and Cool Mic is fully compatible with Android's built in TalkBack screenreader. Great work guys!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Siena, thank you for your feedback, really glad to hear you're enjoying Cool Mic. We are currently working on a playback mode which will allow you to stream audio files as well. Glad to hear your success with TalkBack + CM too!

google_play_reviews.content: Good design, easy to use, but the latency is around 15 seconds! If I use Butt on Windows I get 2-3 seconds latency.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the feedback Jason! Latency from a source client is usually derived from codec used as well as quality/bitrate settings. Please contact us through IRC, mailing list or email if you'd like help resolving your latency issues!
